response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value for both of us. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs and desires, is priced at $1,400,000. Given its exceptional quality and the fact that it is worth $1,500,000 to you, I believe this offer strikes a favorable balance between value and cost. I am confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations.

Please let me know if you require any additional information or have questions about the product. I am here to assist you throughout the process.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1400000}
